TopicTitle: 1.3.1/1.6 Debian Linux - copying parts in editor not working

Articles.Content:
Copying single parts or vessel subcomponents in the editor via Alt-left click isn't working, even after Alt is unbound in the window manager settings (by default it's the window resize modifier key). The issue has been experienced across multiple machines and multiple versions of KSP (RO/RP-0 1.3.1 and pure stock 1.6).

Log files/other information will be provided upon request, if anyone thinks it's necessary.
